name: AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehavior
desc: Constants that control when to allow a virtual device to switch its active primary constituent device.

items.name: case unsupported
items.desc: The device doesnâ€™t support constituent device switching.

items.name: case auto
items.desc: The device automatically selects the best camera for the current scene.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The device restricts fallback camera selection to certain conditions.

items.name: case locked
items.desc: The device locks camera switching to the active primary constituent device.
